about.mission-one: Welcome to the heart of our operation, where the road meets reliability, and journeys become seamless experiences. At Algona, our mission is more than just transporting goods from point A to point B â€” it's about fostering connections, powering economies, and ensuring that every mile traveled is a testament to our commitment.
about.mission-two: Our main goal is not only to provide adaptable Transport and Logistics services in all phases of supply chain management but to keep our standarts high and garantee you effective strategically planning and logistics management, warehouse operations, transportation details, and adaptable customer service solutions.
about.story-one: Algona was established in 2017 Ruse Bulgaria, with a vision to redefine the standards of transportation. Ever since our aim is to provide a diverse range of transportation solutions that cater to the unique needs of our clients.
about.story-two: Over the years, our fleet of trucks has been the backbone of our cargo transportation services. Today we have three trucks for international transportation in EU. All vehicles are maintained and equipped with the latest in tracking and security systems guaranteeing your cargo's safety and on time deliver.
about.service-one: Crafted to ensure a seamless journey for your cargo, every step of the way.
